locutie.beschrijving: Exegesis of Romans 8 focusing on the cosmic scale of Sin and Death, the impotence of the Law, and the victory of Christ over principalities and powers.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High; moves beyond individualistic pietism to a cosmic-theological framework.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the reality of human bondage and the scope of God's victory, with intermittent moments of promising.
voorbeelden: Paul writes extended passages about a threat to humanity...
Humanity is enslaved by these principalities and powers...

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To shift the hearer's perspective from self-justification to reliance on God's cosmic victory.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Explicit; the Spirit is identified as the agent of repentance and righteousness.

voorbeelden: Paul writes about the wrath of God.
The entire cosmos is in bondage to decay.
Listen again to the climactic verses.
I have seen this personally many times.
I will probably have it at my own funeral.
He will also give us all things with him.
Nothing... will be able to separate us from the love of God.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strongly grounded in the text but often framed as 'Paul says' rather than 'God says to you'.

declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate; the preacher relies on quoting the text to perform the act.

indicatoren: Extensive use of 'Paul says' and 'Paul means'.
Long illustrations about the Iraq war used to explain a concept.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a theological lecture rather than a participant in a divine encounter.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise to the specific congregation

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High theological quality but low direct address.
voorbeelden: Nothing... will be able to separate us from the love of God.

tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used late in the sermon to apply the cosmic victory.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Paul, the Iraq war, and the human condition.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a significant distance; the sermon 'talks about' the gospel for a long time.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: Theological truths about Sin and God.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from the diagnosis of Sin (Assertive) to the work of Christ (Commissive/Declarative).
voorbeelden: It is God who justifies... so we can just stop trying.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: It is God who justifies... so we can just stop trying.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon is a masterful explanation of the Gospel's scope, but it functions more as a 'testimony about' the text than a 'sacramental event' where God speaks directly.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: He is thinking of Death as an annihilating Power...

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Paul writes... Paul means... Paul says...
zwakke_punten.probleem: The preacher hides behind Paul rather than speaking as a mandatory.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: The sermon is a profound lecture that occasionally breaks into a 'happening' during the final promises.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The 'Toezegging' (Promise) is present but often mediated through the third person.

openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Low; functions more as an exegetical guide.
tekstueel_bewijs: Listen again to the climactic verses.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: Yes, specifically in the context of repentance.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, the Spirit does the work of righteousness.
tekstueel_bewijs: the Spirit of Christ can do his redeeming work.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Partially; the sermon points to grace but rarely 'dispenses' it.
tekstueel_bewijs: This gospel... is about the remaking of the entire creation.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Shift from 'Paul says' (Assertive) to 'God declares to you' (Declarative).

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Paul says that there is no human way to sort all this out.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: I declare to you today: you cannot sort this out, but God has already done so in Christ.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a report about Paul to a direct address.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is framed as a quote from the past.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use the present tense 'I promise you in the name of Christ'.
voorbeeldzinnen: In Christ, God promises that nothing in your life can separate you from Him.
You are more than a conqueror.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is actually quite good.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Maintain the current indicative-heavy approach but make it performative.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A theologically rich sermon that provides a solid foundation for a sacramental event, needing only a shift in illocutionary stance to become truly performative.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT identifies that the preacher is not just a 'sender' of information but a 'doer' of God's word.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The focus is on the authority of the act (justification) rather than the persuasiveness of the war stories.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT reveals that despite the powerful imagery, the preacher remains in a 'descriptive' mode for 80% of the text.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Theological Constative'—true and deep, but linguistically distant.
